description: He takes Chiffon to the human world from the Kingdom of Sweets, on his search for the Pretty Cures. A ferret-like fairy, he is Chiffon`s caretaker, but always has trouble with taking care of him. He is always anxious but kind, and has an Osakian accent. He is prone to worry and often grumbles, but becomes weak to a good story and will become over emotional. He also loves doughnuts as well.
name: Tart
